page.title: 04A Local Farm By E.Holland
page.content: Mr H.K Jones owns{Lincomb Farm}and others in our area.He started with 100 acres and now has 500.He grows soft fruits,cereals,potatoes,sugar beet and runner beans, he also keeps battery hens but he mainly keeps cows.He buys Hereford Fresian cows at 7 months weighing 700lb.The vet checks them and gives them a growth pellet in their ear to improve the quality of the meat.The cows graze until late Autumn, in Winter they are kept in a hugh barn, they are fed on food that are grown on the farm.In Spring the cows are turned out to graze.They are fattened and sold at{Kidderminster {Market}when they weigh 1100lb.Mr Jones buys more calves and starts again.
